page.title: 11Educational Buildings
page.content: Silverdale County Primary was built in 1872 by the Wolstanton School Board,and since then there have been many changes to the building.There used to be a chimney and an open fire.There are huge metal rods which tie the walls together in case of subsidence caused by mining. Our Infant Department is in a very modern building.It is called an open plan school as there are no doors to the classrooms.The floors are carpeted. Cherry Hill School is in Knutton.It is a modern building made of wood,brick and plasterboard.It has large glass windows and a flat roof. Keele University was founded in 1949 using old military buildings.These have now been replaced by modern,purpose built ones,the most recent one being a new computer centre.The University has many facilities which are available to the people of Keele village.
